title: Activity-Based Collaborative Learning Design for Language Computing Education Utilizing UMI Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental programming concepts and Internet of Things (IoT) technology
context.additional_context: Hybrid education utilizing personal smart devices and IoT sensors in a BYOD environment. Highlights practical language processing cases applicable to job seekers' real-world tasks

learning_goals: Participants can design and implement a language analysis prototype utilizing UMI (Ubiquitous Microcomputing Integration) technology elements (sensors/networks/mini-computing).
In collaborative learning environments, participants can develop at least three IoT data-based natural language processing scenarios.
Participants can evaluate a language pattern recognition system through real-time data collection, analysis, and visualization processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
